title: Mr Magoo
creator_credit: Stanley Tong, Ben Myron and Walt Disney Pictures
brief_description: Mr. Magoo becomes the target of a notorious and ruthless band of international jewel thieves when he sets out to retrieve a stolen gem. Features: Leslie Nielsen, Kelly Lynch, and Malcolm McDowell.
